fields.label: Form type
fields.name: form_type
fields.instructions: Full form will include phone, country and state

fields.label: Form name
fields.name: form_name
fields.instructions: Name of form created in Eloqua/Salesforce

fields.label: Redirect
fields.name: redirect
fields.instructions: Url you will be redirected to

fields.label: "Expired" message
fields.name: expired_message
fields.default_value: This event has been sold out and registration is now closed! Apologies for the inconvenience.

fields.label: Webinar form fields
fields.name: form_fields_webinar
fields.default_value:
<input type="text" name="firstName" id="firstName" value="" class="text" maxlength="40" placeholder="First Name">
<input type="text" name="lastName" id="lastName" value="" class="text" maxlength="40" placeholder="Last Name">
<input type="text" name="emailAddress" id="emailAddress" value="" class="text" maxlength="40" placeholder="Business email">
<input type="text" name="busPhone" id="busPhone" value="" class="text" maxlength="40" placeholder="Phone">
<input type="text" name="company" id="company" value="" class="text" maxlength="40" placeholder="Company">
<label>
    <select name="title" id="title" class="select" placeholder="Role">
        <option value="" selected>Role</option>
        <option value="Actuary">Actuary</option>
        <option value="Business Analyst">Business Analyst</option>
        <option value="Executive">Executive</option>
        <option value="Data scientist - Beginner">Data scientist - Beginner</option>
        <option value="Data scientist - Expert">Data scientist - Expert</option>
        <option value="Data scientist - Management">Data scientist - Management</option>
        <option value="IT professional">IT professional</option>
        <option value="Software Engineer">Software Engineer</option>
        <option value="Other">Other</option>
    </select>
</label>

<input type="text" name="firstName" id="firstName" value="" class="text" maxlength="40" placeholder="First Name">
<input type="text" name="lastName" id="lastName" value="" class="text" maxlength="40" placeholder="Last Name">
<input type="text" name="emailAddress" id="emailAddress" value="" class="text" maxlength="40" placeholder="Business email">
<input type="text" name="busPhone" id="busPhone" value="" class="text" maxlength="40" placeholder="Phone">
<input type="text" name="company" id="company" value="" class="text" maxlength="40" placeholder="Company">
<label>
    <select name="title" id="title" class="select" placeholder="Role">
        <option value="" selected>Role</option>
        <option value="Actuary">Actuary</option>
        <option value="Business Analyst">Business Analyst</option>
        <option value="Executive">Executive</option>
        <option value="Data scientist - Beginner">Data scientist - Beginner</option>
        <option value="Data scientist - Expert">Data scientist - Expert</option>
        <option value="Data scientist - Management">Data scientist - Management</option>
        <option value="IT professional">IT professional</option>
        <option value="Software Engineer">Software Engineer</option>
        <option value="Other">Other</option>
    </select>
</label>

sub_fields.label: Field name
sub_fields.name: f_name
sub_fields.instructions:
*Not the same as field placeholder*
This should be taken from the respective form field in Eloqua

sub_fields.label: Class
sub_fields.name: f_class
sub_fields.instructions:
"first" - first half of the row
"last" - second half of the row
"fullrow" - full row

fields.label: isSalesForm
